amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for programs for the prevention, treatment, control of, and research on tuberculosis by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for programs for the prevention, treatment, control of, and research on tuberculosis by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Brown (OH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
